import React, { useState } from "react"; import FsLightbox from "fslightbox-react"; import { FiPlay } from "react-icons/fi"; const PopupContent = { image: "./images/portfolio/portfolio-04.jpg", popupLink: [ "https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ctsT5Y-InqE&ab_channel=Rainbow-Themes"], } function VideoOne() { const [toggler, setToggler] = useState(false); return (
) } export default VideoOne;
